title: Add NetworkEnvironment type to DataModels
description:
attached_molecule: da-wisp-eut
attached_at: 2026-02-13T23:03:29Z
attached_args: Add NetworkEnvironment type ('production' | 'testnet' | 'local') and EnvironmentConfig interface to the data-models package. Export from index.ts. Add unit tests. This is a simple type addition â€” no business logic, just the shared discriminator type.
dispatched_by: mayor

Add NetworkEnvironment discriminator type to the shared data-models package. Type: 'production' | 'testnet' | 'local'. Also add EnvironmentConfig interface with environment and requiresExplicitProductionOptIn fields. This is an operational mode discriminator (not testnet-specific) approved by Enterprise Architect for placement in the Contract Domain. All downstream test network work depends on this.
